data.text: A phila lueki luidi mu buangu kiaku kioki weti vuanda !
Muelꞌama phuila widi ayi wulembo suki-suki
Ka diambu ko dikuanga beki nzoꞌandi,
Lusakumunu kuidi bobo beti vuanda mu Nzo aku !
Lusakumunu kuidi batu bobo zingolo ziawu zidi mu ngeyo ;
Bu bamviokanga mu ndimba wu Baka,
Wa lusambulu luama, a Yave, Nzambi nkua ngolo yoso,
Bila Yave Nzambi niandi thangu ayi nkaku,
